title: Substation Physical Security Monitoring
description: An agent monitors a remote substation for physical security breaches.

tasks.description: Monitor the substation's perimeter intrusion detection system and security cameras.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is continuously monitoring security feeds.

tasks.description: The system detects motion on a camera after hours and flags that the main gate has been breached.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a high-priority security alarm.

tasks.description: Immediately notify the company's security operations center and the local police department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends notifications to security and law enforcement.
